feed.title: ESL Dialogue
feed.subtitle: Browse our lists of ESL dialogues, where you can find various levels of written English. We have dialogues for beginners, intermediate, and advanced. You will be able to read, print, and even listen to these dialogues! These can help you teach or you can use them for personal purposes.

entry.title: Sonya, The Musician
entry.content:
I’m Sonya.
I’m a musician.
I play the piano after school on Mondays, Wednesdays and Thursdays.
On Tuesdays, I don’t play the piano.
I do my chores.
After school on Fridays, I play with my friend.
We play in the park and we listen to music.
I don’t go to school on the weekend.
I go to piano concerts.

entry.title: What do you do?
entry.content:
Masha: Do you play football on the weekend?
George: Yes, I do.
Masha: Do you play on the computer?
George: No, I don’t. I do my homework.
Masha: Do you play the piano?
George: Yes, I do.
Masha: Do you play the piano on the weekends?
George: No, I don’t. I play on the computer.
